channel.title: Portapps
channel.description: Collection of portable apps for Windows

item.title: Cryptomator portable 1.5.11-5
item.description:
Release of Cryptomator portable 1.5.11-5 is now available.
You can find links to download this release on the Cryptomator portable page.

item.title: Terminus portable 1.0.122-2
item.description:
A new Portapps app has been added to the collection!
Terminus is a terminal for a more modern age.
You can download this first release of Terminus portable 1.0.122-2 on the Terminus portable page.

item.title: Portapps 3.1.0
item.description:
• Add Config func to return global app configuration
  • Add ElectronAppPath func to return the app electron path
  • Add ErrorBoxLog and FatalBoxLog funcs
